title: Iamcrypticguy
author: Iamcrypticguy
content: Hello bitcointalkers, can anyone recommend some movies for me so I can keep myself busy this month Any genre is welcome, it should just be interesting. I await your feedbacks..Thankie.

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.created_time: October 04, 2023, 05:04:50 PMLast edit: October 07, 2023, 03:18:57 AM by albert0bsd
comments.body: Here is a few list o movies that i likeThe Man from EarthThe schindler list.Black MassTropic thunder.kill a mockingbird (I prefer  he book but there is old movie of that)

comments.author: hamzaspy
comments.body: Quote from: Vloachi on October 04, 2023, 04:45:58 PMJawanIt's hindi movie and i think the person who asked is looking for English movie. Btw i watched jawan action thriller movie.

comments.author: L4rs_
comments.body: - The Dictator if you are looking for comedy- Interstellar if haven't seen- Star Wars marathon

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Quote from: L4rs_ on October 05, 2023, 05:58:51 PM- The Dictator if you are looking for comedy- Interstellar if haven't seen- Star Wars marathonhe is asking for October meaning those movies that was released or will be releasing this October.

comments.body: There's a new 'Equalizer 3' featuring Denzel Washington.

comments.body: 1. Black Mass2. The Man from Earth

comments.body: A film that i will definitely go to see in October is The Creator

comments.body: Quote from: julerz12 on October 06, 2023, 02:48:02 PMThe Creator57 SecondsReptileNowhereDeliver UsOn FireHave watched Nowhere last night and yeah it is a good movieQuote from: bitcoin-shark on October 06, 2023, 10:43:16 AMA film that i will definitely go to see in October is The Creatorhave been waiting for the copy of this when available because i can't wait to watch this for free lol .

comments.author: Sanugarid
comments.body: These are the ones I watched a while ago.-Totally Killer-Ballerina-Nowhere-Love at first sight-Evil dead riseAnd I can say that they are okay. Maybe I just liked Ballerina better. I will also look here for other recommendations about movies, maybe there are good ones too.I also intend to watch it because my friend just recommended it to me.Burning Betrayal and The Possession of Hannah Grace.
